subject: Simsonn Plus X
description_text: Hello i did order a set  of Simsonn Plus X ( Order #SSN3243 ) and the hydralic damper to the throttle sonds like it have air in side is this normal if so is there a way to bleed that hydralic damper?

conversations.body_text: Hi aa aa,  If you hear a sound of liquid moving, this is normal. Please clean the dust from the hydraulic rod and apply a small amount of lubricant.Â
Ok, thanks for fast answer, will try that and hope it helps :)
